name: MSSetupSession
desc: An object that manages the transfer of configuration information between your app, the system, your media service, and HomePod speakers.

items.name: var account: MSServiceAccount
items.desc: The streaming media service account for the session to configure.

items.name: var presentationContext: MSAuthenticationPresentationContext?
items.desc: A delegate that provides media setup display information to the system.

items.name: protocol MSAuthenticationPresentationContext
items.desc: A protocol that provides media setup display information to the system.

items.name: func start()
items.desc: Initiates the service configuration process and sends the account details of the streaming media service to the userâ€™s HomePod speakers.
